title: Towel
medium:
Medium: cotton, silk, metal thread
Technique: embroidered
description: Towel of white hand-woven cotton, narrow width (9 1/16 in. from selvage to selvage). Ends embroidered in silk design of double row of stylized jars of flowers, alternating with tall trees. Colors: rose, green, and yellow and blue, flat gold.
name: Towel
